website_summaries.verdict: A sporty shoe that looks good on the trail and on the street, the Vitesse OutDry from Columbia ticks the box for comfort, stability, and protection. This waterproof hiker is lauded for its seam-sealed construction which means less water intrusion and enhanced upper strength and durability. Plus, the lightweight midsole creates a cushiony platform and absorbs impact well.It's a great shoe overall, and is best used for light hiking, quick day hikes, casual activities, and trips around the town.
pros: Out of a handful of verified Columbia Vitesse OutDry reviews, nearly everyone agrees that it's a super comfortable shoe
Everyone is also satisfied with its waterproofing qualities
It's not just great for the summer but also during rainy days when you don't want to wear boots, according to some customers
Despite the presence of a waterproof membrane, this shoe remains breathable, according to an expert review
An avid hiker praises the Vitesse OutDry for being a lightweight hiking shoe
The same in-depth review also mentions the firm heel cup that keeps the heel in place and keeps the foot stable
cons: This shoe lacks lateral support so it may not be suitable for serious hikes

customer_reviews.title: Overall a solid performer, but be warned
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this show is a great wet weather solution for an active life. However, it has a number of small, niggly (yet eminently fixable, were Columbia to take some time) issues: 1. The neck of the shoe flexes as the toe leaves the ground, meaning that any small stones are easily flicked into the footbed. It’s a deeply annoying issue. 2. Due to the fabric mesh/rubber-coated outer, she shoe will become easily stained. Removing muddy stains from uncoated fabric is relatively straightforward, but removing said stains from the fabric covered by the rubber adornments is impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Ows

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for dog walking and have had them several months now. While they are comfortable enough and fit as expected I bought them as they claimed to be waterproof but after a few weeks that was not the case. Coming back now from every walk with drenched feet even if it is only dew on the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were great when I got them. Unfortunately they've lasted less than two months. Only used for walking the streets and already a hole is developing, which makes the waterproofing instantly useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoes but!
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, the left foot is perfect but we the right is a little tight in a couple of places on my big toe the worst so I’m trying to ease them out with a wooden spoon and wearing for short time. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Iain J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable waterproof shoes. They are perfect for walking and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIAN U

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant waterproof trainer for everyday walking and trekking in wet weather. Tried few times in all weathers and no complaints so far. Fit seems perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Manchester

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought half a size bigger due to reviews - fitted perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Neil Emery

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight, waterproof shoe
customer_reviews.text: Got these in a size 8 for my brother. He usually takes that size, and found these to fit fine. The shoes are really comfy, he says, offering good support at the front and back, and a good fit round the toes. The sole is also very cushioned and has plenty of grip. The shoe has a waterproof-breathable, seam-sealed construction, meaning no water gets inside. This makes them great for hiking. The shoes are also extremely lightweight, with a mesh upper that stops your feet getting sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Shine

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool and comfortable they're obviously to big for me but that didn't stop me from trying them, i gave this to my brother and hes really happy hes usually not a trainers kind of person but hes been using them for workout and it killed me a little inside at first but least its being used Love the colours, really well made, good brand so you know they can be trusted which is the main thing overall happy
customer_reviews.author: Shelina begum

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable trainers
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. These trainers have a nice sponginess to them which is comfortable on the souls of your feet and give you an extra little bit of height. They are relatively soft all over and have a decent tread. I wouldn't wear them for outdoor football, but maybe five-a-side or running in. The colours are a little jazzy for my tastes but overall they're decent enough.
customer_reviews.author: Fallen

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Vitesse Outdry Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: You like to be fast and light during a hike? This Columbia multi-sport hiking shoe keeps you going all day for outdoor adventures. It features an OutDry waterproof and breathable mesh body construction with seamless no-sew overlays for fit, support and lightness. The ultra-lite midsole provides a maximum cushioning underfoot experience and superior comfort. Enjoy an excellent cross-terrain stability and grip on rock, dirt and gravel in both dry and wet conditions thanks to the outsole featuring a blend of rubber compounds and lug patterns.
